description.translate: If he had a restless youth, I promise him a peaceful old age...

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Le marginal\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7S'il a eu une jeunesse agitée,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7je lui promets une vieillesse paisible...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7If he had a restless youth,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7I promise him a peaceful old age...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
